definitions: The action of grinding or crushing something in a mill.
The action of cutting, shaping, or finishing a material with a milling machine.
The action of moving around in a confused or aimless manner.
The action of producing a raised edge on a coin or other object.
examples: The milling of grain into flour is a traditional process.
The engineer was milling the metal to precise specifications.
The crowd was milling about waiting for the gates to open.
The mint was milling the edges of the new coins.
